{"label":"HyperGraph Concepts","category":"TextLabels_Size6","alignment":"0 0.5 0 0","alignmentFocus":"0 0.5 0 0","size":"2733 240","key":85,"location":"2430 -1370"},
{"label":"Thoughts:\n- Computers OS UIs are still an engineering vision rather than inspired from natural interaction\n   --> Documents in Directory Structures vs Spread on Desktop\n   --> Shell\n   --> Small icons, small fonts\n   --> Rigid user experience (I can't write on my desktop, folders, draw, sketch)\n   --> Limited space (one screen when you don't use virtual desktop). Nevertheless virtual desktop often are rigid and inflexible for a natural interaction\n   --> When you restart a computer (unnecessary action for human) you lose all your organisation of all windows and screens, ... \n\n- Our idea of NiOS connects perfectly to the ideas of AppleVision Pro, Meta Quest and a future VR Experience","category":"TextLabels_Size4","size":"1101 396","key":86,"location":"3640 260","font":"27px sans-serif","alignment":"0 0.5 0 0","alignmentFocus":"0 0.5 0 0"},
{"label":"Thoughts:\n- Current web pages are mostly based on a 1D long document (Egyptian Papyrus)\n- More and more applications a moving to the web -> the future platform of applications\n- Web-based applications are the easiest to interface to each other\n- In navigating the web we have often the problem that leaving one page for another make us forget our navigation history (we could have a graph our of our navigation)\n- In navigating we don't have a natural way to annotate our navigation, so all ideas around a navigation session are lost...often we need to access that information \n- \n\n- Our idea of XiWeb connects perfectly to the ideas of AppleVision Pro, Meta Quest and a future VR Experience ","category":"TextLabels_Size4","size":"1095 398","key":87,"location":"3650 -290","font":"27px sans-serif","alignment":"0 0.5 0 0","alignmentFocus":"0 0.5 0 0"},
{"label":"Definitions","category":"TextLabels_Size4","alignment":"0 0.5 0 0","alignmentFocus":"0 0.5 0 0","size":"1719 85","key":76,"location":"3460 -660","color":"Yellow"},

{"label":"Thoughts:\n- Although MDD is quite an old methodology, its adaptability is slow and scattered. There are too many issues in the way tools implement MDD and too many brakes in making it understood by developers. We need an easier way to propose MDD to people","category":"TextLabels_Size4","size":"1101 396","key":97,"location":"3620 800","font":"27px sans-serif","alignment":"0 0.5 0 0","alignmentFocus":"0 0.5 0 0"},
